title.rendered: “IDF Reveals Names of Fallen Soldiers: Updates on Wounded Troops from Northern Gaza Battles”

content.rendered:
Attached is a message from the IDF spokesperson regarding the names of three fallen IDF soldiers, which have been relayed to their families: https://IDFANC.activetrail.biz/ANC05122023IJOTRGHGIVBB

Here is a link to the IDF website, where their details and photos are posted and updated: https://www.idf.il/59780

In addition, a soldier from the Nahal Brigade, as well as an officer and a soldier from the Paratroopers Brigade, were seriously wounded in various battles in the northern Gaza Strip. Similarly, a soldier from the 53rd Battalion of the ‘Barak’ (188) Brigade was seriously injured in a battle in the northern Gaza Strip.
The wounded were taken for medical treatment at the hospital and their families have been updated.
